type_text: An Ordinary Mortal new to power
rules_text: Spellcaster | Genesis → Draw a spell.

type_text: A cruel conspiracy of Ordinary Beasts
rules_text: Airborne | Damage dealt by Blood Ravens' strikes heals you.
flavour_text: Dark wings bring dark winds.

type_text: Elite Mortals at night’s last service
rules_text: Deathrite → Proceed to the end phase.
flavour_text: “If Candlemas be fair and bright, winter has another fight. If Candlemas brings cloud and rain, winter shall not come again.“

type_text: An Ordinary Spirit chases the wind
rules_text: Airborne, Movement +2
flavour_text: Children sense beings that we cannot, in innocence seeing what wisdom forgot.

type_text: An Exceptional Undead with a sanguine desire
rules_text: Airborne | Damage dealt by Daperyll Vampire's strikes heals you.

type_text: An Ordinary Demon stalks the witching hour
rules_text: Stealth
flavour_text: Tiptoe cross the weald’s black maw, where horned fiends creep ware tooth and claw.

type_text: An Elite Dragon of long horizons
rules_text: Airborne | Moves freely sideways.

type_text: An Elite Mortal of arcane expertise
rules_text: Spellcaster | Genesis → Draw three spells.

type_text: A Unique Spirit awaits us all
rules_text: Lethal | Whenever Grim Reaper kills a minion, banish that minion and all copies. Search its owner's cemetery, hand, and spellbook and banish any copies. They shuffle.

type_text: Exceptional Beasts circle the skies
rules_text: Airborne, Charge
flavour_text: A wing aloft, will oft descry | The turning of the screw | ’Fore knee or eye construe

type_text: An Exceptional Beast of grand bearing
rules_text: Airborne | May carry a weaker allied minion.
flavour_text: Hardly a comfortable ride, but a ride, nonetheless.

type_text: An Exceptional Spirit, whereabouts unknown
rules_text: Voidwalk | At the start of your turn, Headless Haunt teleports to the top of a random site or void.
flavour_text: Jacet sine nomine truncus.

type_text: Ordinary Mortals storm the gates
rules_text: Charge
flavour_text: What need for spells when one can cast iron?

type_text: An Elite Mortal and master of flight
rules_text: Genesis → You may search your hand and spellbook for a Beast with Airborne and mana cost ② or less and summon it here. Shuffle if needed.

type_text: A Unique Mortal with many a suitor
rules_text: Genesis → Search your spellbook for an artifact that costs ① or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle.
flavour_text: Only a fool would hope to win a princess' heart—and title—with trinket and trifle.

type_text: Nowhere is safe from these Elite Beasts
rules_text: Airborne, Burrowing, Submerge, Voidwalk | Nearby enemies permanently lose Stealth.
flavour_text: From hell's heart they stab at thee.

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal hits and runs
rules_text: Ranged | Immediately after performing a ranged strike, Kite Archer may take a step.

type_text: A Unique Spirit of unspeakable emptiness
rules_text: Voidwalk | At the end of your turn, Lord of the Void may banish an adjacent site, unless there's an Avatar there.

type_text: Ordinary Beasts bleat in discord
rules_text: Whenever Men of Leng strike an Avatar, that Avatar discards a random card.

type_text: An Ordinary Mortal hides in shadow
rules_text: Ranged, Stealth
flavour_text: I'll have respect for your laws when you make them respectable.

type_text: An Exceptional Monster, terminally transformed
rules_text: Sacrifice an allied Mortal → Summon Moon Clan Werewolf from your hand to the Mortal's location.
flavour_text: Upward, before the onmooning it wolfed.

type_text: An Elite Undead of torment and terror
rules_text: At the end of your turn, for each enemy minion here, you may push it to an adjacent location or void.
flavour_text: Nightly we ply the razor thin barrier between being and unbeing.

type_text: An Elite Spirit of turbulent terror
rules_text: Airborne | Discard a spell → Deal 3 damage to another random unit here.

type_text: Ordinary Beasts soar in lunar choir
rules_text: Airborne, Burrowing
flavour_text: To the bat, it is the world that’s blind. To the song-spun tapestry of its kind.

type_text: An Exceptional Spirit of limitless velocity
rules_text: Airborne, Movement +3, Voidwalk
flavour_text: The truly sublime know no bounds.

type_text: An Exceptional Spirit of imagined evil
rules_text: When Phantasmal Shade is struck, destroy it.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast courses the cosmos
rules_text: Movement +2, Voidwalk | May carry an allied minion.

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal fades into nothingness
rules_text: Voidwalk | Whenever Phase Assassin enters the void, he gains Stealth.

type_text: An Ordinary Beast of extraordinary extravagance
rules_text: Airborne
flavour_text: Thereupon I could not breathe, but sighs were pardoned unto me. To see the pegasus fly is to feel the spirit soar.

type_text: An Elite Spirit pulls the strings
rules_text: Airborne | Genesis → Gain control of all tapped minions here until Puppet Master leaves the realm.

type_text: An Elite Spirit takes an eerie encore
rules_text: Can't defend. May be cast from your cemetery.

type_text: An Elite Sphinx proffers perplexity
rules_text: Airborne | Genesis → Look at your topmost spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook, then an opponent may exchange your top and bottommost spells. Draw a card.

type_text: An Ordinary Monster from out of the blue
rules_text: May be summoned to any site.
flavour_text: Heeere's Brawny!

type_text: Exceptional Mortals harry from horseback
rules_text: Ranged | During basic movement, Skirmishers of Mu may perform a ranged strike from any location along their path.

type_text: An Elite Spirit and welkin overlord
rules_text: Airborne | All other minions lose Airborne.

type_text: Exceptional Faeries flitter hither and thither
rules_text: Airborne, Ranged | Takes no damage from units with 4 or more power.

type_text: An Ordinary Beast prowls powdry peaks
flavour_text: “This is the Le-o-pard, my child, His temper’s anything but mild.” ― A. M. Shaw & C. Beckwith

type_text: An Ordinary Undead roams betwixt the between
rules_text: Voidwalk
flavour_text: “We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far.” ― H. P. Lovecraft

type_text: An Exceptional Undead towers above
rules_text: If Spire Lich is atop a Tower, it has +2 power, Ranged, and Spellcaster.

type_text: A Unique Spirit of unhallowed eve
rules_text: Airborne, Voidwalk | Genesis → Summon each other dead Voidwalk minion to a nearby site or void.

type_text: An Elite Spirit of overcharged existence
rules_text: Voidwalk | ① → Gain +1 power this turn.

type_text: An Exceptional Spirit of capricious casting
rules_text: Airborne, Air Spellcaster | After Wind Sylph casts a Magic spell, she may push a unit here one step.

type_text: A Unique Angel, dauntless and daring
rules_text: Airborne | Whenever a weaker allied minion here is attacked, you may return it to its owner's hand.

type_text: Elite Mortals take to the skies
rules_text: Airborne, Movement +2 | May carry any number of allied minions.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of tactical transmission
rules_text: An ally teleports to a location it’s nearby. Draw a card.

type_text: Unique Magic to probe the possible
rules_text: Look at your next seven spells. Put one in your hand and the rest on the bottom of your spellbook in any order.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of arcing current
rules_text: Deal 2 damage to target unit nearby. Any number of times, you may spend ② to additionally target a new unit nearby the previous one.

type_text: Elite Magic of orbital dexterity
rules_text: Place target minion on the back of your hand, then blow it off from a height of at least one foot. Deal damage equal to its power to each unit atop the site it lands on, including itself.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of fractured fascination
rules_text: Destroy all auras and artifacts at target location up to two steps away.
flavour_text: ... and a haughty spirit before a fall.

type_text: Unique Magic glimpses beyond the veil
rules_text: An allied Spellcaster falls asleep and is disabled until hurt. At the start of your next turn, if it's still asleep, you may wake it up to search your spellbook for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle if needed.
flavour_text: When your dreams are your own, I'll meet you there.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of covert concealment
rules_text: Give an allied minion Stealth. If it occupies an enemy site, draw a card.
flavour_text: I could pay, but then I'd just have to rob them again.

type_text: Exceptional Magic and peculiar ploy
rules_text: Teleport any number of allies at one location to another location a chess knight's move away. Draw a card.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of acrobatic assault
rules_text: An ally shoots a projectile. If it hits a unit, the ally is dragged to that location, and may strike the hit unit when it arrives.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of shocking uncertainty
rules_text: Deal 3 damage to a random unit at target location.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of grave consequence
rules_text: Kill all Mortal minions at target location up to two steps away.
flavour_text: Man is born a candle, the better part burnt out.

type_text: Unique Magic of great awakening
rules_text: Gain ② this turn for each allied Spellcaster here.
flavour_text: “With mingled reverence and awe they cried, softly, odiously, appalling, the name of the Being whom they momentarily expected to appear.” ― Algernon Blackwood

type_text: Exceptional Magic of stunning realization
rules_text: Deal 1 damage to each minion here. They're disabled until your next turn.
flavour_text: A laden conscience soon becomes leaden.

type_text: Ordinary Magic eclipses the sun
rules_text: Deal 1 damage to each aboveground minion.
flavour_text: “Then we will fight in the shade!“— Dienekes

type_text: Exceptional Magic of unsettling necromancy
rules_text: Summon a random dead minion.
flavour_text: The living need the dead far more than the dead need the living. — Thomas Laqueur

type_text: Exceptional Magic of last resort
rules_text: Teleport any number of allied minions to the caster’s location.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of psychic swiping
rules_text: Caster snatches and picks up target nearby artifact they can carry.
flavour_text: “If it’s in my hand, it’s mine.” — Toddler’s first rule.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of abrupt relocation
rules_text: Teleport an ally to the surface of target site.
flavour_text: “There was no real sense of time passing, and in the last act it felt like everyone was just teleporting everywhere.” — Highland Theater Critic

type_text: Elite Magic forges a strange coalition
rules_text: Draw a card for each rarity among allied minions.
flavour_text: There are three rules for winning a war. Unfortunately, nobody knows what they are.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of dimensional distortion
rules_text: Choose two different sites. This turn, units can move between them as if they were adjacent.

type_text: A vicious vortex of Exceptional Magic
rules_text: An ally may take up to two steps, and then strikes each enemy along their entire path.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of weighty weather
rules_text: Push everything atop sites one step in a cardinal direction.

type_text: An Exceptional Aura of dread and foreboding
rules_text: You may summon Spirits to affected sites. When you summon a Spirit here, give it Charge, and return Evil Presence to its owner's hand.

type_text: An Exceptional Aura ushers in a dark era
rules_text: You may summon minions to affected sites.
flavour_text: The icy earth swung blind and blackening in the moonless air. Morn came and went—and came, and brought no day. — Lord Byron

type_text: An Exceptional Aura of tempestuous fury
rules_text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to a random unit atop affected sites, then you may move Thunderstorm one step. Lasts 3 of your turns.

type_text: An Ordinary Aura of bitter obstruction
rules_text: Conjure atop the border of a site you control. Minions with Airborne or 2 or less power can't traverse Wall of Air.

type_text: Exceptional Mortals with prodigious poles
rules_text: Strikes first while attacking.
flavour_text: “It serves him right who runs into the long reach of a pikeman.” — Grimmelshausen

type_text: Ordinary Spirits of sweet succor
rules_text: Älvalinne Dryads provide ①.
flavour_text: How fair to greet, on misted morn | A daint parade of dew-kissed bloom | Now deep, inspire! A bliss reborn | Of air faint lade with sweet perfume

type_text: Ordinary Mortals of magnificent stature
flavour_text: “Tonight, we keep watch. And tomorrow, before the dawn, we shall arm ourselves in our weapons, and beside their hollow vessels waken bitter Ares.“— Homer

type_text: Elite Giants bear the weight of the world
rules_text: Genesis → This site and an adjacent site change places, carrying along everything of normal size.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast renowned in legend
flavour_text: Concerning the fair unicorn, sundry notions do abide. Some demur, others deny, children delight, and charlatans lie.

type_text: Ordinary Mortals draw on distant foes
rules_text: Ranged
flavour_text: In the left hand of every delight lies woe; and for that, my bow.

type_text: Ordinary Undead scrabble to the surface
rules_text: Whenever you play an earth site, you may summon Bone Rabble from your cemetery to that site.

type_text: An Ordinary Troll of gentle disposition
flavour_text: Its thoughts are reflections in a forest pool, softly trembling with wind and rain.

type_text: Ordinary Trollses put noses in holeses
rules_text: Burrowing
flavour_text: We dig, we lug, we nosh da bug. Bore ore nor more, we jig and jug!

type_text: An Elite Beast expands your demesne
rules_text: At the end of your turn, if no enemy units occupy this site, permanently gain control of it.

type_text: A Unique Mortal with umpteen agnates
rules_text: Deathrite → If you control another Mortal, return Crown Prince to its owner's hand.
flavour_text: Emmerich, the final Daniger king, assumed the throne only after outliving a horde of brothers and nephews.

type_text: Exceptional Mortals who yield no ground
rules_text: Can only move themselves forward.
flavour_text: “‘Fairest of sights on the dull black earth,’ some say, ‘Is a host of horse in battle array.’ | ‘A phalanx on foot,’ another will cry, ‘Or a navy full sail athwart the sky.’“— Sappho

type_text: Exceptional Dwarves tirelessly tunnel
rules_text: Burrowing | Allied minions occupying nearby sites have Burrowing.

type_text: Exceptional Mortals of till and toil
rules_text: Tap → Reveal and play your topmost site to an adjacent void or Rubble. Frontier Settlers move there and lose this ability.
flavour_text: “Be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth.” — Genesis 1:28

type_text: Exceptional Gnomes gnot gnearly gnabbed
rules_text: Burrowing | At the end of your turn, Gneissgnath Gnomes may burrow.

type_text: A ravenous pack of Ordinary Beasts
rules_text: Your spellbook may include any number of Grey Wolves. Has +1 power for each other Grey Wolves nearby.

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal holds banner high
rules_text: Other nearby allies have +1 power.
flavour_text: Our crest and banner will once again be a symbol of glory and strength!

type_text: A Unique Mortal, triumphant and true
rules_text: Other Mortals have +1 power. You control all Mortals.

type_text: An Ordinary Mortal promulgates royal decree
rules_text: Genesis → Draw a site.
flavour_text: Bare is the brotherless back. And so too shall be unlevied land.

type_text: An Ordinary Mortal with an enduring grudge
rules_text: Genesis → Kill target Spellcaster minion nearby.
flavour_text: Death is too kind for the likes of you. But I am a kind man.

type_text: An Elite Mortal follows all trails
rules_text: All enemies permanently lose Stealth.
flavour_text: Becoming sufficiently familiar with nature is a substitute for understanding it.

type_text: A Unique army of Mortals, yours to command
rules_text: Tap → Target a location up to three steps away. Deal 4 damage to each unit there. Deathrite → Summon a Foot Soldier token to each adjacent location.

type_text: Ordinary Mortals on a mission of mercy
rules_text: Genesis → You may return a minion that died this turn from your cemetery to your hand.
flavour_text: Seek not relief for grievous deeds in mercy done, but know that the prayers of all good people are good.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast weathers all storms
rules_text: At the start and end of your turn, choose whether Monastery Gargoyle has Airborne or is a non-minion artifact.
flavour_text: Through rain and regret, Through wind and war, we bide our time.

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal of grim determination
rules_text: Genesis → Kill a nearby Monster.
flavour_text: Nor glory nor profit is his reward—a safer world is.

type_text: Elite Mortals of primordial vengeance
rules_text: Spellcaster | Whenever you lose life due to an undefended attack nearby, the attacker's controller also loses that much life.

type_text: An Elite Giant of monumental proportions
rules_text: Occupies four locations.
flavour_text: Heart and hearth will tremble.

type_text: An Exceptional Demon of corpulent choler
rules_text: Immobile | Tap → Shoot a projectile. If it hits a unit, drag it to this location. Pudge may fight it.

type_text: A Unique Mortal, comely and covetous
rules_text: After an opponent draws a card, if they have more cards than you, you may draw a card.
flavour_text: Only a fool outshines the sun.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast with a snare of silk
rules_text: Burrowing | While Root Spider is burrowed, minions directly above it are disabled.

type_text: An Elite Mortal of steadfast loyalty
rules_text: If a nearby Avatar or royalty (King, Queen, Prince, or Princess) would take damage, Royal Bodyguard may take that damage instead.

type_text: Ordinary Beasts with extraordinary sniffers
rules_text: Nearby enemies permanently lose Stealth.
flavour_text: For the upwardly mobile of the Midland Court, accolades in the Royal Hunt of the Mist were as treasured as any war-time achievement.

type_text: Ordinary Undead of recent vintage
rules_text: Whenever an allied Mortal dies on land, you may summon Scourge Zombies from your cemetery to its location, tapped.

type_text: Exceptional Mortals hold the line
rules_text: Nearby allies take 1 less damage.
flavour_text: My word is my bond, my shield is my service.

type_text: Elite Angels hold constant vigil
rules_text: Airborne | At the end of your turn, untap all allies here.

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal dispenses almighty justice
rules_text: Takes no damage from Demon, Spirit, or Undead minions.
flavour_text: Struck down, the templar rose again, guided by his holy purpose—and the dawn rose with him.

type_text: Elite Mortals not to be disturbed
rules_text: Other nearby minions lose all non-basic abilities.
flavour_text: “Since long I’ve held silence as a remedy for harm.” — Aeschylus

type_text: An Exceptional Giant dozes peacefully
rules_text: Genesis → Fall asleep. Slumbering Giantess is disabled until hurt.

type_text: Elite Beasts wriggle and writhe
rules_text: Whenever a nearby minion dies, Squirming Mass permanently gains its power.

type_text: Elite Monsters gaze longingly from afar
rules_text: Other minions at rest at adjacent locations are disabled.
flavour_text: In the gleam of his unblooded sword, Veslin unwittingly beheld a sight no mortal had yet lived to unsee.

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal prepares for the worst
rules_text: Units nearby take no damage from Magic spells.
flavour_text: He frets incessantly to preserve the life he's not living.

type_text: Exceptional Mortals ride onward to glory
rules_text: Vanguard Knights have +2 power if they alone are the furthest forward of your units.

type_text: An Elite Mortal with a forlorn flock
rules_text: Spellcaster | Other nearby minions have -2 power.
flavour_text: What sense in hoping for death, with nothing left to die for?

type_text: Ordinary Beasts with brindled bristles
flavour_text: Twere once again drowsy, when all in a rush, wild boar came a-snuffling, straight out of the brush!

type_text: An Elite Giant makes an epic entrance
rules_text: Genesis → Strike each enemy here.
flavour_text: O valley low, innocent dove What grievous blows rain from above

type_text: Exceptional Mortals entrenched and armed
rules_text: Ranged | Takes no damage from ranged strikes.
flavour_text: Corin's shield wracked and shivered like a plucked bowstring—but held!—while he reloaded.

type_text: Elite Magic of motley menagerie
rules_text: Search your spellbook for different Beasts with a combined mana cost of X or less, reveal them, and put them in your hand. Shuffle your spellbook.

type_text: Ordinary Magic to defend the motherland
rules_text: Summon a Foot Soldier token to each site you control that borders an enemy site.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of terranean internment
rules_text: Burrow target minion or artifact, if able.
flavour_text: “From out of the depths of the countless pits there came a melancholy rustling from the garments of the buried.” — Edgar Allan Poe

type_text: Exceptional Magic of discipline and duty
rules_text: Search your spellbook for an Exceptional Mortal, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your spellbook.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of falling prospects
rules_text: Burrow all minions and artifacts occupying target land site.

type_text: The Ordinary appears as Magic to some
rules_text: Search your spellbook for an Ordinary card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your spellbook.
flavour_text: “Common sense is the most widely shared commodity in the world, for every man is convinced that he is well supplied with it.” — René Descartes

type_text: Elite Magic of cataclysmic impact
rules_text: As an additional cost to cast Craterize, discard a site. Destroy target site and deal damage to each unit above or below a site in the area of effect:

type_text: Ordinary Magic of shattered vanity
rules_text: Destroy all auras and artifacts at target location up to two steps away.
flavour_text: Pride goeth before destruction ...

type_text: Exceptional Magic of faith unfettered
rules_text: You gain 7 life.
flavour_text: Pray not for an easier path, but to become a stronger person.

type_text: Elite Magic of violent upheaval
rules_text: You may rearrange sites within a two-by-two area, carrying along everything of normal size. Then burrow all minions and artifacts on those sites.

type_text: Ordinary Magic to expulse the unholy
rules_text: Banish all Demon and Undead minions at target location up to two steps away.
flavour_text: Nor devil nor demon shall undo this done! Begone!

type_text: Unique Magic of surpassing strength
rules_text: Give an allied unit +6 power this turn.
flavour_text: I, uh ... think you're gonna need a new roof.

type_text: A rickety ride of Exceptional Magic
rules_text: This turn, your units can move between any sites in a chosen span of land as if they were adjacent.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of decisive force
rules_text: Give an ally +2 power this turn.
flavour_text: Suddenly the soldier was flung so violently from his mount, his sword became a ploughshare.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of unfaltering formation
rules_text: Until your next turn, each ally takes 1 less damage for each other ally it's nearby.

type_text: Unique Magic mourns a long lost past
rules_text: Fill up to thirteen voids with Rubble.
flavour_text: For each layer of ruin excavated, another calamity of yore was revealed.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of calm repose
rules_text: Destroy all artifacts and Undead minions at a location up to two steps away.
flavour_text: “My heart, why come you here alone? The wild thing of my heart is grown, to be a thing, fairy, and wild, and fair, and whole.” — G. P. T. Branwen

type_text: A Unique Aura to reclaim the holy land
rules_text: You may summon earth minions to affected sites. Allied earth minions occupying affected sites have +1 power.

type_text: An Ordinary Aura of trammeling roots
rules_text: Minions occupying affected sites lose Airborne and are Immobile. Lasts 3 of your turns.

type_text: An Elite Aura of grave permanence
rules_text: Whenever a Spirit or Undead minion occupies affected land sites, burrow it.

type_text: An Elite Dragon of breathtaking majesty
rules_text: Airborne | Tap → Deal 4 damage to each other unit at target location nearby.

type_text: Ordinary Mortals fight for a price
rules_text: You may discard a random card rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
flavour_text: The purse has enticements unknown to virtue.

type_text: An Elite Beast of candescent splendor
rules_text: Airborne | If Askelon Phoenix would take damage from a fire spell or ability, it gains +1 power this turn, instead.

type_text: Exceptional Undead roused from rest
rules_text: Summon Awakened Mummies burrowed safely. When an enemy unit moves onto the ground above them, they unburrow and intercept.
flavour_text: Bodies in desert tombs are often very well preserved. Mayhap too well.

type_text: An Ordinary convoy of divers kin and kind
rules_text: Has all elements and minion types.
flavour_text: Defendit numerus, liberat varietas.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast with venom-dript fangs
rules_text: Genesis → May kill target minion here.
flavour_text: Born of earth, yet suckled by Hell's fire.

type_text: An Ordinary Beast bears the wide world
rules_text: May carry any number of allied minions.
flavour_text: Louder, louder! Blast your snorting drums! Life’s most weary load is yet to come.

type_text: Elite Demons run amok
rules_text: Tap → Move three steps in a cardinal direction. When Bull Demons of Adum enter each location, they strike each untapped unit there.
flavour_text: “A bull won’t charge a sleeping man. Go to bed, child.”

type_text: Ordinary Mortals brewing with ill intent
rules_text: Spellcaster | Genesis → You may sacrifice another minion here to draw a spell.

type_text: A Unique Demon on a short leash
rules_text: Must be summoned to your location. Cerberus in Chains automatically follows you and can't move itself away.

type_text: Exceptional Monsters of ardent desire
rules_text: Airborne | Genesis → Teleport target weaker minion to this location. Clamor of Harpies may strike it.

type_text: Exceptional Dragons disgorge dollops of flame
rules_text: At the end of your turn, Colicky Dragonettes shoot a projectile. It deals 1 damage.
flavour_text: Wee dragon’s game a belch of flame to lay the mighty low.

type_text: A Unique Mortal of sedition and seduction
rules_text: Genesis → During their next turn, each player is controlled by the previous one.
flavour_text: Well all the while blood shall spill, should woman's wile belie man's will.

type_text: A Unique Mortal and artist of the afterlife
rules_text: Genesis → Kill all other minions.
flavour_text: With frank hand the dark traveler laid waste to all who came before him. A master of the art paints a portrait of death.

type_text: A Unique Mortal prognosticates the end
rules_text: Nearby units take double damage, except from strikes.
flavour_text: The end is nigh!

type_text: An Exceptional Monster of singular focus
rules_text: Doesn’t strike back while defending.
flavour_text: “We wept and raised our hands to the heavens on seeing such a horrific sight, for we knew not what else to do.” — Homer

type_text: An Elite Mortal with exacting aim
rules_text: Stealth | Tap → Far East Assassin throws an artifact he carries at target adjacent unit. It takes damage equal to the artifact's mana cost.

type_text: An Elite Spirit and ghost in the shell
rules_text: Tap → Until Grosse Poltergeist leaves the realm, gain control of a nearby artifact and animate it. It's an Automaton with power equal to its cost, and has its own bearer abilities.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast with an adamant eye
rules_text: Other minions at rest here or one step in front of Hillock Basilisk are disabled.

type_text: Elite Undead wreathed in hellfire
rules_text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to each other adjacent unit.
flavour_text: Grave candélabre, en danse macabre, the Damned parade in ghastly mob.

type_text: An Elite Beast, deadly, defiant, and fierce
rules_text: Can simultaneously attack up to three units at the same location.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast with a fiery temper
rules_text: Fire Spellcaster | Takes no damage from fire spells.
flavour_text: Attempts to induce metamorphosis in neotinic lavalotls were, unfortunately, successful.

type_text: An Elite Monster snarls around the corner
rules_text: Enemy minions can’t move themselves out of the a maze of nine locations nearby Maze Minotaur.

type_text: Ordinary Ogres blunder about
flavour_text: “Grok, grok! Me find rock!” “What rock do? It sit there!”

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal finds solace in solitude
rules_text: Moves freely between land sites not occupied by other units.

type_text: An Elite Beast keeps vigilant watch
rules_text: Airborne, Lethal | At the end of your turn, if you cast a non-fire spell this turn, untap Panorama Manticore.

type_text: Ordinary Mortals charge into battle
rules_text: Charge
flavour_text: By their swift steeds and swifter swords the tide of many a battle has turned.

type_text: A terrifying tangle of Ordinary Beasts
rules_text: Burrowing, Lethal
flavour_text: Always look before you leap, for snakes among the hollows creep.

type_text: Exceptional Goblins raise a ruckus
rules_text: At the end of your turn, Quarrelsome Kobolds strike themselves or another target adjacent unit.
flavour_text: “He started it!” — The one that started it

type_text: An Ordinary and superbly indifferent Beast
flavour_text: “And a coarse grace remained: his head was high, Though his gaunt flanks with a great mange were worn: There was not any yearning in his eye, But on his lips and nostril infinite scorn.” — Archibald Young Campbell

type_text: Ordinary Mortals adrift among dunes
rules_text: Movement +1 | Takes no damage from Deserts.
flavour_text: As the sands shift, so shall we.

type_text: Ordinary Beasts with an explosive finale
rules_text: Airborne | Deathrite → Deal 3 damage to each unit here.
flavour_text: It’s all fun and games until someone steps on a bug.

type_text: An Ordinary Beast swims seas of sand
rules_text: Burrowing, Landbound
flavour_text: Only a soft susurration betrays the passing of these desert leviathans far beneath your feet.

type_text: An Exceptional Demon rummages refuse
rules_text: Genesis → Conjure a broken artifact to this location.

type_text: An Elite Mortal serves the highest bidder
rules_text: Avatars nearby have “Discard a card → Gain control of Seasoned Sellsword.“

type_text: Ordinary Beasts with deathly stings
rules_text: Lethal
flavour_text: Tread light! And hasten thee away from skittering cinders, sun-scorched obsidian shards asway.

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal keeps her distance
rules_text: Movement +1 | Enemy Avatars within Swiven Scout's range of motion play with their hands revealed.
flavour_text: “Know thine enemy and know thyself, and feel not the awe of a hundred battles.“— Sun Tzu

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal lusts for blood
rules_text: Whenever Tvinnax Berserker can attack a unit, he must. Untap Tvinnax Berserker whenever he attacks and kills an enemy minion.
flavour_text: Most folk share naught with berserkers save for being, and even that not for long.

type_text: An Ordinary firestarter of a Demon
rules_text: Genesis → May deal 2 damage to target adjacent unit.
flavour_text: One good burn deserves another.

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal on a spiritual journey
rules_text: Whenever Wayfaring Pilgrim enters each corner of the realm for the first time, you may draw a card.

type_text: Exceptional Spirits of fascination and folly
rules_text: Voidwalk | Whenever Wills-o’-the-Wisp are attacked, they may teleport to another nearby location or void to evade the attack.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of treachery and treason
rules_text: Target minion moves to an adjacent location, if needed, to strike another target tapped minion there.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of blistering speed
rules_text: This turn, give an ally Movement +2, it can't be intercepted, and it leaves a trail of fire at departed locations. When it stops, each unit along the trail takes 2 damage.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of sudden scalding
rules_text: Destroy all minions occupying target water site up to two steps away.

type_text: A billowing blast of Exceptional Magic
rules_text: Choose a direction from the caster. Deal damage to each unit at a location in the area of effect:

type_text: Ordinary Magic to smite your enemy
rules_text: The next time an ally strikes a unit this turn, it deals double damage.

type_text: Elite Magic of utter annihilation
rules_text: Banish target minion nearby, and everything it carries.
flavour_text: “For dust thou art, and to dust thou wilt.” ― Genesis 3:19

type_text: Exceptional Magic of deflagrant destruction
rules_text: Shoot a projectile. It deals 4 damage on impact, and 2 damage to each other unit at that location.

type_text: Ordinary Magic unleashes a blazing barrage
rules_text: Shoot three projectiles in the same direction, one at a time. Each deals 1 damage.

type_text: Elite Magic ravages the realm
rules_text: Flame Wave flows horizontally, from one edge of the realm to the other. Deal damage to each unit atop sites in the area of effect:

type_text: Ordinary Magic of focused fire
rules_text: Shoot a piercing projectile. Deal 2 damage to one unit at each location along its path.

type_text: Unique Magic of distilled devastation
rules_text: Deal 7 damage to target minion nearby.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of draconic conflagration
rules_text: Deal 4 damage to each other unit at target location near the caster or an allied Dragon.
flavour_text: Scaleforge stoked, proud kite untamed, in flagrant flight unfurled.

type_text: Sophisticated Magic for Elite access
rules_text: Gain control of target enemy minion until it deals damage, and tap it. It gains Stealth.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of savage saltation
rules_text: An ally may take a step, and then it strikes each enemy at its location.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of utmost urgency
rules_text: Draw a card, then give an ally Movement +1 this turn.
flavour_text: Guaranteed delivery in one month or less, or your money back!

type_text: A tremendous blast of Elite Magic
rules_text: Target a location up to two steps away. Deal damage to each unit at locations in the area of effect:

type_text: Elite Magic of otherworldly destruction
rules_text: Target three sites that share no borders. Deal damage to each unit atop sites in each area of effect:

type_text: Ordinary Magic of proximal plosion
rules_text: Deal 3 damage to each unit at target location up to two steps away.

type_text: Unique Magic commands a heavy price
rules_text: Sacrifice the caster or lose half your life, rounding up. If you do, draw three cards.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of mephitic miasma
rules_text: Lethal | Deal 1 damage to each other nearby minion.

type_text: Elite Magic of dire desperation
rules_text: Choose any number of sites you control. Destroy each of those sites and everything there.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of radial violence
rules_text: An ally strikes each enemy at its location.

type_text: Unique Magic of hyper-violence
rules_text: This turn, double an allied minion's power, and whenever it attacks and kills a unit, it untaps. At the end of the turn, it dies.

type_text: An Exceptional Aura of desperate dearth
rules_text: Affected sites aren't water sites, and provide no water threshold.

type_text: A Unique Aura of zealous devotion
rules_text: You may summon fire minions to affected sites. Allied fire minions occupying affected sites have +1 power.

type_text: An Ordinary Aura of swirling silica
rules_text: Affected sites and units atop them can't be attacked or intercepted. At the start of your turn, dispel Sandstorm.

type_text: An Ordinary Aura and blazing barricade
rules_text: Conjure atop the border of a site you control. Whenever a unit passes through Wall of Fire, it takes 3 damage.

type_text: An Exceptional Aura of itinerant ignition
rules_text: Conjure Wildfire atop a single site nearby. At the end of each turn, each unit here takes 3 damage, then move Wildfire to an adjacent location it hasn't visited before. If none remain, dispel Wildfire.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast of deadly portent
rules_text: Airborne | When a unit kills Accursed Albatross, kill that unit's other allied minions it's nearby.

type_text: An Elite Mortal with duplicitous skills
rules_text: Spellcaster | Tap → Search your hand, cemetery, or spellbook for another Adept Illusionist and summon it nearby. Shuffle if needed.

type_text: An Exceptional Spirit born of the sea
rules_text: Submerge | Anui Undine has +1 power for each site in her body of water.
flavour_text: What is a puddle but an ocean waiting to be discovered?

type_text: An Exceptional Troll accosts the incautious
rules_text: Whenever an enemy attacks Bridge Troll, they must spend all of their remaining mana to give to you on your next turn.
flavour_text: Oi! 'oo 's 'at trippin' o'er me bridge?

type_text: An Exceptional Beast with a giant appetite
rules_text: Genesis → Brobdingnag Bullfrog swallows another target minion here. He carries it disabled in his belly until he leaves the realm.

type_text: A Unique Mortal of seafaring infamy
rules_text: Whenever Captain Baldassare attacks a unit or site, the defending player discards their topmost three spells. You may cast each of those spells once this turn, ignoring threshold requirements.

type_text: An Ordinary Beast of tidal wilderness
rules_text: Submerge
flavour_text: Why'd the kelpie cross the shoal? To get to the other tide.

type_text: An Elite Mortal with a mischievous smile
rules_text: At the end of your turn, each nearby Avatar discards a random card.

type_text: Ordinary Merfolk of mysterious depths
rules_text: Submerge | Genesis → Draw your bottommost spell.

type_text: An Elite Monster of benthic horror
rules_text: Submerge | Tap → Surface to strike each other unit nearby.

type_text: Exceptional Beasts with spring in their step
rules_text: Can leap entirely over adjacent sites in one step.

type_text: An Ordinary Mortal of quiet inspiration
rules_text: Spellcaster | Whenever Fenvale Muse casts a spell, you may trigger the Genesis of a nearby River.
flavour_text: As the sun troubles the morning she stirs my heart.

type_text: An Exceptional Faerie and unwelcome guest
rules_text: May be summoned to any site. Genesis → You may return a minion here to its owner’s hand.

type_text: Elite Spirits sail undying seas
rules_text: Voidwalk | Whenever Ghost Ship enters a site from the void, you may summon a Spirit from any cemetery to its location.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast smells blood in the water
rules_text: Submerge, Waterbound | Whenever another unit enters or moves between sites in this body of water, Giant Shark moves to that unit to fight it.

type_text: A Unique Monster drowns the cosmos
rules_text: Submerge | Genesis → Permanently flood the entire realm, including voids.
flavour_text: What lurks beneath depths unplumbed by mortal keel! Dark and darker black tides roll, heedless of earth's cries for ransom.

type_text: Exceptional Merfolk croon a captivating chorus
rules_text: Submerge | At the start of your turn, force target nearby enemy minion to take a step toward Guile Sirens.

type_text: A Unique Merfolk of aquatic might
rules_text: Submerge | Other allies occupying Lord of Unland's body of water have +1 power.
flavour_text: The Ocean-Mist that bends, that binds, nor' east sou' west the rolling tides.

type_text: An Elite Monster engulfs the realm
rules_text: Megamoeba moves by extending a single pseudopod from any part of itself. It occupies all locations it has ever occupied, and has +1 power for each.

type_text: A Unique Spirit of divine fecundity
rules_text: At the start of your turn, reveal your topmost spell. If it's a minion, you may summon it here.

type_text: Ordinary Beasts squelch and squirm
rules_text: Burrowing, Submerge
flavour_text: These pallid parasites plague the swamplands, effortlessly boring through fen and flesh alike.

type_text: An Ordinary Mortal holds steady and true
rules_text: Nearby allies can't be moved by enemy spells and abilities.
flavour_text: Neither should a ship rely on one small anchor, nor a life on one fair hope. ― Epictetus

type_text: Exceptional Mortals in perilous pursuit
rules_text: Tap → Deal 1 damage to target minion above or below an adjacent water site and pull that minion to this location.

type_text: An Ordinary ship of Mortal scum
rules_text: Waterbound
flavour_text: “Build me straight, O worthy Master! Staunch and strong, a goodly vessel, That shall laugh at all disaster, And with wave and whirlwind wrestle!“ — Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

type_text: Ordinary Beasts of extreme latitudes
rules_text: Can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected.

type_text: Elite Mortals on an icy expedition
rules_text: Allied units here can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected.

type_text: An Ordinary and prickly little Beast
rules_text: Lethal, Submerge
flavour_text: A remarkable thirteen pufferfish entries are found in Bog'duul’s Greater and Lesser Poisons and Their Uses.

type_text: A Unique Mortal of hibernal majesty
rules_text: Charge | Allies can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected. Other allies occupying sites there have +1 power.

type_text: An Exceptional Mortal loots and pillages
rules_text: Whenever Sea Raider attacks and kills an enemy, its controller discards their topmost spell. You may cast that spell once this turn, ignoring threshold.

type_text: An Ordinary Beast bestrides the ocean
rules_text: Submerge, Waterbound
flavour_text: The study of sea serpents advances one funeral at a time.

type_text: Ordinary Beasts that scrape and sidle
rules_text: Can only move themselves sideways.
flavour_text: “One will never make the crab walk straight.“ — Aristophanes

type_text: An Elite Monster of multifarious might
rules_text: Immune to non-lethal damage.
flavour_text: Fell the tree, and the branches are soon cut off. — Francis Quarles

type_text: An Elite Faerie of sincerest flattery
rules_text: May be summoned as a basic copy of a nearby minion.
flavour_text: Common folk view their lives through a half-silvered mirror, seeing only their own reflection.

type_text: An Elite Mortal burgles and borrows
rules_text: Stealth | Tap → Steal an artifact out of the hands of another target unit here, and stay Stealthed.

type_text: An Ordinary Beast of ponderous proportions
flavour_text: Impassive, plump, and peaceful, the swamp buffalo is an icon of contentment.

type_text: Ordinary Mortals of eerie grace
rules_text: Airborne, Submerge
flavour_text: Before woman was, the water awaited her.

type_text: Exceptional Spirits crash into shore
rules_text: Submerge | This site is flooded. It is a water site.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast with a crushing embrace
rules_text: Tap → Tringh Constrictor may take a step, then it constricts target minion here and carries it disabled. The next time Tringh Constrictor would untap, it instead kills that minion if it's still constricted.

type_text: Ordinary Beasts with plated pelt
rules_text: The first time Tuft Turtles would take damage each turn, prevent that damage.
flavour_text: A turtle is never without a castle—or a coffin.

type_text: An Elite Beast lurks and lures
rules_text: Submerge | At the start of your turn, if Unland Angler is submerged, force each enemy minion atop adjacent sites to take a step toward this one.

type_text: An Exceptional Beast whelms the unwary
rules_text: Submerge | Whenever Unland Eel submerges, it may drag another minion here down with it.

type_text: Elite Beasts imperil this pond
rules_text: Discard a water site → Untap Yokai Kappas. Use only once per turn.
flavour_text: In the cool winter months when cucurbits don't grow, kappas of the Yokai forest find other means of refreshment.

type_text: Exceptional Magic, nimble and quick
rules_text: May be cast when an ally is attacked. An attacked ally may move to another adjacent location to evade the attack.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of downward descent
rules_text: Submerge target minion or artifact, if able.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of guttering failure
rules_text: Banish all fire minions and fire auras occupying target site up to two steps away.

type_text: Ordinary Magic to reel in your prey
rules_text: Deal 1 damage to target minion above or below an adjacent Water site and pull it to the caster's location. Draw a card.

type_text: A rejuvenating infusion of Exceptional Magic
rules_text: Each ally heals an amount equal to the number of sites in its body of water.

type_text: An Exceptional explosion of arctic Magic
rules_text: Freeze nearby enemy minions. They're disabled until your next turn.

type_text: A sudden gush of Exceptional Magic
rules_text: This turn, flood target site and give each minion there Airborne. Draw a card.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of cold-blooded precision
rules_text: Shoot a piercing projectile. Deal 3, then 2, then 1 damage to up to one unit at each of the first three locations along its path.

type_text: Exceptional Magic for the shrewd seafarer
rules_text: This turn, your units can move between any sites in a chosen body of water as if they were adjacent.

type_text: Unique Magic in its most annoying form
rules_text: Summon seven Frog tokens.
flavour_text: No more chilling a sound than a congress of croaks, and the splitter splatter of slimy feet.

type_text: Elite Magic of transfrogrification
rules_text: Transform target nearby minion into a Frog token.

type_text: Elite Magic of counterfeit conjuring
rules_text: Conjure a copy of an artifact carried by the caster.
flavour_text: A great sorcerer does not imitate; he plagiarizes.

type_text: Ordinary Magic to catch the unwary
rules_text: Target water site pulls in an aboveground unit it's adjacent to. Draw a card.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of brief diminution
rules_text: Set the base power of target nearby unit to 0 until your next turn.

type_text: Ordinary Magic of soporific slumber
rules_text: Target minion at a location up to two steps away falls asleep. It's disabled until it takes damage.
flavour_text: Breathe deep the gathering bloom.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of maritime furor
rules_text: Submerge all minions and artifacts occupying target water site.
flavour_text: The sea is angry today, my friends; hike and hold, men, fly! Bring due astern Neptune's belly!

type_text: Unique Magic to reverse one's fortunes
rules_text: Exchange life totals with target opponent. (X) is the difference between your life totals.

type_text: Exceptional Magic of fluid undoing
rules_text: Target a nearby site. Return each artifact and minion there to its owner's hand.
flavour_text: There is no height to which confident fools cannot ascend.

type_text: Elite Magic of merciless deluge
rules_text: Flood all sites adjacent to a body of water this turn. Then submerge all minions and artifacts on water.

type_text: An Elite Aura of milk and honey
rules_text: Each affected site provides one additional mana.

type_text: A Unique Aura of hubris humbled
rules_text: Affected non-Ordinary sites are flooded. They are water sites, only provide Water threshold, and lose all other abilities. Genesis → Submerge all minions and artifacts atop affected sites.

type_text: An Ordinary Aura of forestalling frost
rules_text: Affected sites and units atop them can't be attacked or intercepted. At the start of your turn, dispel Blizzard.

type_text: An Exceptional Aura of epochal inundation
rules_text: Affected sites are flooded. They're water sites.
flavour_text: Nature is the anvil that has broken many hammers.

type_text: An Exceptional Aura of wrongs not forgiven
rules_text: Whenever a minion enters an affected water site, submerge it and return Mariner's Curse to its owner's hand.

type_text: An Elite Aura of simpler times
rules_text: Minions occupying affected sites lose all non-basic abilities.

type_text: An Ordinary Aura of impassable ice
rules_text: Conjure atop the border of a site you control. Units can't traverse Wall of Ice on the ground.

type_text: Elite Armor fit for any adventure
rules_text: Bearer has Burrowing, Submerge, and Voidwalk, if it's a minion.

type_text: A Unique Relic of ethereal essence
rules_text: Provides (A) and ① to its controller.

type_text: An Elite Relic of seraphic transfixion
rules_text: At the end of each turn, the controller of Angel's Egg's site heals 1 life.

type_text: A Unique Relic of fluidic finesse
rules_text: Provides (W) and ① to its controller.

type_text: An Exceptional Device pummels and pounds
rules_text: Units here have “Tap → Destroy target adjacent Wall or Monument.”

type_text: An Elite Monument to common conviction
rules_text: At the end of your turn, untap all nearby allies.

type_text: An Elite Monument of ominous aspect
rules_text: Black Obelisk's site has “At the start of your turn, lose 2 life and gain ② this turn.”

type_text: A Unique Monument to grim persistence
rules_text: If a spell or non-basic ability can target—in order of precedence—Blasted Oak, its site or location, or anything else at its site or location, it must.

type_text: X marks the spot for these Exceptional Relics
rules_text: If cast, conjure this under an allied land site of an opponent's choice. When Buried Treasure is carried to the surface, its controller sacrifices it and draws two cards.

type_text: An Elite Monument to the arrogance of man
rules_text: Whenever a player draws a card, that player taps their strongest untapped minion.
flavour_text: “Be sure of this, O young ambition, all mortal greatness is but disease.” — Herman Melville

type_text: An Exceptional Automaton of insatiable hunger
rules_text: At the start of each player's turn, Crave Golem attacks a random minion within its range of motion, or takes a step toward the closest minion if it can't.
flavour_text: As enmity gave way to amity, we soon found we'd created far worse than a monster: a machine.

type_text: A Unique Relic for champions triumphant
rules_text: Bearer has +3 power if they've ever killed a minion.
flavour_text: The gods see their glory in you this day.

type_text: An Elite Relic of diabolical affliction
rules_text: At the end of each turn, the controller of Devil's Egg's site loses 1 life.

type_text: A Unique Device of mutually assured destruction
rules_text: Doomsday Device enters the realm with 6 counters. At the end of each player’s turn, remove a counter. When the last is removed, it detonates! | Deals damage to each unit at affected locations:

type_text: Elite Instruments of mass percussion
rules_text: Damage dealt to minions nearby is lethal.
flavour_text: A trepid pulse, a throb of bloodpour’d passion, and life’s spark seemed to each one about them lost.

type_text: An Exceptional Weapon fumes and flares
rules_text: Bearer has +1 power, and its strikes splash full damage to each other enemy at a struck unit's location.

type_text: Unique Armor and bulwark against death
rules_text: If bearer is a minion and would die, instead fully heal it and banish Gilded Aegis.

type_text: An Exceptional Relic of crippling chains
rules_text: May be conjured to target enemy minion. Bearer is disabled.
flavour_text: How can you claim to be free, when you've never tried to find the end of your tether?

type_text: A Unique Relic of preternatural providence
rules_text: Bearer's controller determines all random outcomes.
flavour_text: All winds are favorable when the destination is unknown.

type_text: An Elite Document of indisputable claim
rules_text: Bearer has “You control this site.”
flavour_text: Possession is nine tenths of the law.

type_text: An Exceptional Relic of benison and boon
rules_text: Bearer's controller has “Whenever you would determine an outcome at random, determine it an extra time and choose one.”

type_text: An Elite Relic of dreadful dissonance
rules_text: Spells cast by a nearby Spellcaster cost ② more to cast.
flavour_text: I can't hear myself think!

type_text: An Elite Relic for the intrepid traveler
rules_text: Opposite edges of the realm are connected.
flavour_text: Whatsoever turns all haste we tack, each the terrene through, our stars will cross anew.

type_text: An Elite Relic of disquieting silence
rules_text: Bearer loses all non-basic abilities, and can't drop Magnetic Muzzle. At the end of each player’s turn, if Magnetic Muzzle is abandoned, that player attaches it to a nearby minion.

type_text: Elite Armor in the midst of a mad mêlée
rules_text: Whenever a nearby minion can attack, it must. Nearby strikes deal double damage.

type_text: An Elite Potion and effervescent elixir
rules_text: Sacrifice Mix Aer → This turn, bearer's next Air spell requires no threshold and costs ③ less to cast.

type_text: An Elite Potion and briny brew
rules_text: Sacrifice Mix Aqua → This turn, bearer's next Water spell requires no threshold and costs ③ less to cast.

type_text: An Elite Potion and piquant potable
rules_text: Sacrifice Mix Ignis → This turn, bearer's next Fire spell requires no threshold and costs ③ less to cast.

type_text: An Elite Potion and loamy libation
rules_text: Sacrifice Mix Terra → This turn, bearer's next Earth spell requires no threshold and costs ③ less to cast.

type_text: A Unique Relic of geodic potency
rules_text: Provides (E) and ① to its controller.

type_text: A Unique Monument to corrupted quiddity
rules_text: The first time each turn a Magic spell is cast nearby, Orb of Ba'al Berith creates a copy. The spell's controller may choose new targets.
flavour_text: The ineffable, conveyed ineffably.

type_text: An Elite Weapon flings aught far and wide
rules_text: Tap bearer and another ally here, Discard a card → Deal damage equal to the discarded card's mana cost to each unit at target location up to three steps away.

type_text: A Unique Monument to cyclical cessation
rules_text: At the end of each player's turn, Pendulum of Peril kills all minions at its current location and another adjacent location of that player's choice.

type_text: A Unique Relic and magnum opus
rules_text: The first spell of each element cast by the bearer each turn costs ① less.

type_text: A Unique Document of transmundane madness
rules_text: Bearer has “Tap → Reveal your topmost spell and draw it. Bearer takes damage equal to that card's cost.”
flavour_text: An understanding so vast it leaves little room for sanity.

type_text: An Exceptional Weapon of virulent venom
rules_text: Bearer has Lethal.
flavour_text: Scantest scratch fulfilled | Withal the strength of twenty | Shall thine heart be stilled

type_text: An Elite Automaton of ceaseless slaughter
rules_text: At the start of your turn, Purge Juggernaut taps and moves to an adjacent location. Kill all minions there.

type_text: An Exceptional Relic that gathers no moss
rules_text: Units here have “Tap → Give Rolling Boulder a push. It rolls as far as possible and deals 4 damage to each other unit along its path.”

type_text: A Unique Relic of inflamed efficacy
rules_text: Provides (F) and ① to its controller.

type_text: A gaunt and ragged Ordinary Relic
rules_text: Genesis → Return each Airborne minion here to its owner’s hand. Airborne minions can't enter this location.

type_text: An Elite Relic of unbridled rage
rules_text: Whenever bearer attacks and kills an enemy, it untaps.

type_text: Unique Armor for traipsing and japesing
rules_text: Bearer has Movement +7.
flavour_text: “Bring me my boots at once, so that I may catch them!“ — Charles Perrault

type_text: An Exceptional Weapon and engine of war
rules_text: Tap bearer and another ally here → Deal 3 damage to target unit up to two steps away.

type_text: A Unique Weapon of divine retribution
rules_text: Bearer has “Tap → Throw Spear of Destiny at any minion anywhere. It teleports to that minion’s location and kills it.”
flavour_text: Nor mortal's blood shall sate a hunger erst whetted by divine.

type_text: Exceptional Relics lost at sea
rules_text: If cast, conjure this under an allied water site of an opponent's choice. When Sunken Treasure is carried to the surface, its controller sacrifices it and draws two cards.

type_text: A Unique Monument to life everlasting
rules_text: Whenever anyone plays a card with cost equal to the number of level counters on The Immortal Throne, they draw a card and add a level counter. At level 8 or more, an Avatar here alone wins the game.

type_text: An Exceptional Relic of recurring force
rules_text: Bearer has +1 power. At the end of your turn, return this to its owner’s hand.

type_text: An Exceptional Weapon with an all-seeing eye
rules_text: Bearer has Ranged and can target Stealth units.

type_text: An Elite Automaton of mechanic cryptopsy
rules_text: At the end of your turn, you may burrow and/or unburrow any combination of artifacts and minions at this site.

type_text: An Ordinary sprig of an Automaton
rules_text: Non-fire Spellcaster
flavour_text: By twisted frame round willow's heart, let none disclaim my turner's art.

type_text: An Exceptional Device of aerial ingenuity
rules_text: Bearer has Airborne and Movement +1, if it's a minion.

type_text: A Unique Site aloft and ever-fleeting
rules_text: (A)(A)(A) — Once on your turn, this site may fly to a nearby void.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of contemplation
rules_text: Genesis → If this is the only Dark Tower you control, gain ① this turn.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of rumination
rules_text: Genesis → If this is the only Gothic Tower you control, gain ① this turn.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of introspection
rules_text: Genesis → If this is the only Lone Tower you control, gain ① this turn.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of narrow passage
rules_text: Minions can't enter this site on the ground if there's already a minion atop.

type_text: An Elite Site of destinies deciphered
rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next three spells. Put them back in any order.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of singing tailwinds
rules_text: Airborne minions atop Updraft Ridge have Movement +1.

type_text: An Exceptional Site safeguards the horizon
rules_text: Enemy units atop nearby sites permanently lose Stealth.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of unyielding solidity
rules_text: Can't be moved, destroyed, or modified.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of quaint construction
rules_text: Units with 3 or more power can’t enter this site.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of benefaction and blessings
rules_text: Genesis → Each nearby Avatar heals 3 life.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of abundance
rules_text: Genesis → You may pay ① to summon a Foot Soldier token here.

type_text: A Unique Site at creation’s core
rules_text: (E)(E)(E) — All minions have Burrowing.

type_text: A Unique Site of forgotten aeons
rules_text: Genesis → Banish all dead minions, and you heal 1 life for each.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of swamp and slough
rules_text: Genesis → Until your next turn, units are Immobile while they occupy nearby sites.

type_text: An Elite Site of earth torn asunder
rules_text: You may pull apart a partial row or column to make a void in which to play this.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of fertility
rules_text: Genesis → You may pay ① to summon a Foot Soldier token here.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of subterranean passage
rules_text: Burrowed allies can move as if this were adjacent to your other sites.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of fecundity
rules_text: Genesis → You may pay ① to summon a Foot Soldier token here.

type_text: An Exceptional Site with striking views
rules_text: Ranged units atop this site have +1 range.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of ruin
rules_text: Genesis → Deal 1 damage to each minion atop target nearby site.

type_text: An Elite Site with swart and sweaty artisans
rules_text: Anyone may conjure Weapons and Armor here, and for ① less.

type_text: An Elite Site of uncertain apprehension
rules_text: When played, you may return a site in play you own to your hand to play this site in its place.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of blight
rules_text: Genesis → Deal 1 damage to each minion atop target nearby site.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of decline
rules_text: Genesis → Deal 1 damage to each minion atop target nearby site.

type_text: A Unique Site with incendiary intent
rules_text: Fire Spellcaster

type_text: An Exceptional Site of unsettled animosity
rules_text: Genesis → Reactivate the Genesis abilities of your nearby Deserts.

type_text: A Unique Site of industrialized evil
rules_text: Other nearby sites lose their abilities.

type_text: A Unique Site of doom foretold
rules_text: (F)(F)(F) — Sacrifice Vesuvius → Each unit occupying nearby sites takes 3 damage.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of refreshment
rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of intermittent inundation
rules_text: Once on your turn, you may flood an adjacent site this turn.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of imperious majesty
rules_text: Minions occupying nearby sites can't submerge or surface.

type_text: An Elite Site of dormant monstrosity
rules_text: (W)(W)(W)(W)(W)(W)(W)(W) — May transform into a Monster. Place flooded Rubble underneath.

type_text: A Unique Site of ineluctable malevolence
rules_text: At the start of your turn, you may pull in each minion in this body of water one step.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of rejuvenation
rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

type_text: An Ordinary Site of renewal
rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

type_text: A Unique Site and nursery for nuisance
rules_text: (W)(W)(W) — Genesis → Summon three submerged Frog tokens here.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of strong undercurrents
rules_text: Genesis → Staying within this body of water, move target unit one step.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of Earth and Water
flavour_text: Through brick and ashlar conduits flows the lifeblood of an empire.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of Water and Air
flavour_text: A luminous pillar pierced the tempest, and we knew. All was not lost! We were home.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of Fire and Water
flavour_text: Where blood nourishes sand, life springs anew.

type_text: A Unique Site of virgin splendor
rules_text: Provides no mana or threshold unless completely empty.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of Fire and Air
flavour_text: What do lines on a map mean to the sand and the sun and the wind?

type_text: An Exceptional Site of Earth and Fire
flavour_text: There's beauty in the simplicity of empty horizons.

type_text: A Unique non-Euclidean Site
rules_text: Provides no mana or threshold if not adjacent to the void.

type_text: An Exceptional Site of Earth and Air
flavour_text: The wind's wild words, in uncertain surges, whisper how the world was made.

type_text: An Elite Site drifts through infinity
rules_text: Units can move between this site and any void as if they were adjacent.

type_text: An Elite Site of the wages of war
rules_text: Genesis → Conjure a broken Weapon or Armor here.

type_text: A Unique Site brimming with death
rules_text: Genesis → Each player may summon a minion from their cemetery here.

type_text: An Elite Site of depth and despair
rules_text: Whenever a non-Airborne minion enters this site, kill it.

type_text: An Exceptional Site and fundament of the firmament
rules_text: You may play this site to any corner.

type_text: An Elite Site points in the right direction
rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next four sites. Put three on the bottom of your atlas.

type_text: A Unique Site of sacred communion
rules_text: This site and minions here can't be attacked.

type_text: A Unique Site for anyone and everyone
rules_text: Anyone may cast minions here and they may do so for ① less.

type_text: An Elite Site on the border of unreality
rules_text: Must always be adjacent to the void.

type_text: An Exceptional Site kneels before none
rules_text: Once per turn, may attack or defend against enemy units here.

type_text: A Unique Site of colossal obstruction
rules_text: Enemy units can’t move through this site’s top border on the ground.

type_text: An Elite Site once spanned an empire
rules_text: Genesis → Target opponent, then you, may play a site adjacent to this one.

type_text: A Unique Site of shimmering reflection
rules_text: This site enters the realm as a copy of another nearby site.

type_text: An Exceptional Site awash with sludge
rules_text: At the start of your turn, surface or unburrow each minion occupying target site nearby.

type_text: An Elite Site and gateway to oblivion
rules_text: Minions here can traverse the void, gaining Voidwalk until leaving it.

type_text: An Elite Site of primeval bounty
rules_text: Genesis → If you control fewer sites than any opponent, draw three sites.

type_text: A Unique Site and earthbound cradle
rules_text: When the Roots of Yggdrasil are destroyed, destroy everything.

type_text: An Elite Site of impending collapse
rules_text: Sacrifice Sinkhole → Destroy a nearby site.

type_text: An Elite Site where leylines converge
rules_text: Minions here are Spellcasters.

type_text: A Unique Site of denied absolution
rules_text: Genesis abilities here are also Deathrite abilities.

type_text: A Unique Site of beguiling riches
rules_text: The first time an Avatar stops here, they draw three cards and skip their next turn.

type_text: Your Avatar to win the battle and the war
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. Whenever Battlemage attacks and kills an enemy, you may draw a spell.

type_text: Your Avatar turns death into dominion
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. You may cast one dead minion each turn, and for (0) if you’re on Death’s Door. Whenever you summon a minion this way, banish it.

type_text: Your Avatar of wonder and awe
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. You have an additional (E)(F)(W)(A).

type_text: Your Avatar of transcendent triumph
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. Whenever you cast a spell, you may animate target aura until your next turn. It’s an aura minion with power equal to its cost.

type_text: Your Avatar finds the way to victory
rules_text: Your atlas can’t contain duplicates. Draw no sites during setup. Tap → Reveal and play the topmost site of your atlas to an adjacent void or Rubble and move there.

type_text: Your Avatar prognosticates success
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. At the start of your turn, look at your topmost site or spell. You may put it on the bottom of its deck.

type_text: Your Avatar has entered the contest!
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. Tap → Draw a spell.

type_text: Your Avatar's enemies are in for a shock!
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. Tap → Target nearby location. Deal damage to another random unit there equal to the sum of (A) on spells you've cast this turn.

type_text: Your Avatar cultivates the seeds of conquest
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. If you played an earth site, fill a void adjacent to you with Rubble. Tap → Replace an adjacent Rubble with the topmost site of your atlas.

type_text: Your Avatar rises from the ashes to rule
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. Tap, Banish all your dead fire minions → Shoot a projectile. It deals damage equal to to the sum of their (F).

type_text: Your Avatar of ebb and flow
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. Tap → Flood a site near your body of water until you do so again. Tap minions without submerge there. They don't untap the next time they would.

type_text: Principal/Director/Sales Representative
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. Tap → Draw a site.
